mapper.select: SELECT mc.coupon_id, mc.reg_date, mc.exp_date, mc.status, c.name, c.amount, c.type, c.content FROM member_coupon mc, coupon c WHERE mc.coupon_id = c.coupon_id AND member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_coupon (member_id, coupon_id, reg_date, exp_date, status) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{couponId}, sysdate, #{expDate}, '1')
